SpinDec2
Modelling Spinodal Decomposition

19 
20  subroutine mobility(M, MA, MB, EA, EB, c0, c, T, problem)
21 
22  real(real64), intent(inout):: M(:,:)
23  real(real64), intent(in):: c(:,:), T(:,:)
24  real(real64), intent(in):: MA, MB
25  real(real64), intent(in):: EA, EB
26  real(real64):: boltz
27  real(real64):: c0
28  real(real64), parameter:: R = 8.314
29  integer:: Nx, Ny
30  integer:: i, j
31  character(len=*), intent(in):: problem ! defines the set up of M
32 
33 
34  nx = size(c, 1)
35  ny = size(c, 2)
36 
37  select case (problem)
38 
39  !Temp-- Diffusive mobility dependent on c, and atomic mobilities
40  ! are dependent on T
41  case ("temp")
42 
43  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j, boltz)
44  do j = 1, ny
45  do i = 1, nx
46  boltz = r*t(i, j)
47  m(i, j) = 1/boltz*exp(ea/boltz)*(1-c(i, j))
48  m(i, j) = m(i, j) + 1/boltz*exp(eb/boltz)*c(i, j)
49  m(i, j) = m(i, j)*c(i, j)*(1-c(i, j))
50  end do
51  end do
52  !$omp end parallel do
53 
54  !NonTemp-- Diffusive mobility still dependent on c, but atomic mobilities
55  ! are independent on T
56  case ("nontemp")
57 
58  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j)
59  do j = 1, ny
60  do i = 1, nx
61  m(i, j) = (ma*(1-c(i, j)) + mb*c(i, j))*c(i, j)*(1-c(i, j))
62  end do
63  end do
64  !$omp end parallel do
65 
66  !Constant-Diffve Mobility is taken to be a mixing of the two constant
67  ! mobilities, and is independent of c
68  case ("constant")
69 
70  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j)
71  do j = 1, ny
72  do i = 1, nx
73  m(i, j) = (ma*(1-c0) + mb*c0)*c0*(1-c0)
74  end do
75  end do
76  !$omp end parallel do
77 
78  case ("spectral")
79  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j)
80  do j = 1, ny
81  do i = 1, nx
82  m(i, j) = (ma*(1-c0) + mb*c0)*c0*(1-c0)
83  end do
84  end do
85  !$omp end parallel do
86  ! condition to enforce one of the two setups
87  case default
88  print*, "PLEASE INPUT PROBLEM AS 'spectral', 'temp', 'nontemp' or 'constant'"
89  stop "STOPPED"
90 
91 
92  end select
93 
94  end subroutine
95 
96 
105 
106  subroutine del_q(dQ, Q, dx, dy, Nx, Ny, Q_halo)
107 
108  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
109  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: Q
110  real(real64), dimension(Nx, 4), intent(in):: Q_halo
111  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: dQ
112  real(real64), intent(in):: dx, dy
113  real(real64):: dx2, dy2
114  real(real64):: der_x, der_y
115  integer:: i, j ! counters
116 
117  ! Pre-compute 1.0/(dx^2) and 1.0/(dy^2)
118  dx2 = 1.0 / (dx*dx)
119  dy2 = 1.0 / (dy*dy)
120 
121  ! Start computing derivatives
122  ! Corner nodes
123  ! Top-left
124  der_x = (q(2, 1) - 2.0*q(1, 1) + q_halo(1, left)) * dx2
125  der_y = (q(1, 2) - 2.0*q(1, 1) + q_halo(1, up)) * dy2
126  dq(1, 1) = (der_x+der_y)
127 
128  ! Bottom-left
129  der_x = (q(2, 1) - 2.0*q(1, ny) + q_halo(1, left)) * dx2
130  der_y = (q_halo(1, down) - 2.0*q(1, ny) + q(1, ny-1)) * dy2
131  dq(1, ny) = (der_x+der_y)
132 
133  ! Bottom-right
134  der_x = (q_halo(ny, right) - 2.0*q(nx, ny) + q(nx-1, ny)) * dx2
135  der_y = (q_halo(nx, down) - 2.0*q(nx, ny) + q(nx, ny-1)) * dy2
136  dq(nx, ny) = (der_x+der_y)
137 
138  ! Top-right
139  der_x = (q_halo(1, right) - 2.0*q(nx, 1) + q(nx-1, 1)) * dx2
140  der_y = (q(nx, 2) - 2.0*q(nx, 1) + q_halo(nx, up)) * dy2
141  dq(nx, 1) = (der_x+der_y)
142 
143  !print*, dQ(1, 1)
144 
145  ! Boundary nodes
146  ! Top-j = 1
147  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, der_x, der_y)
148  do i = 2, nx-1
149  der_y = (q(i, 2) - 2.0*q(i, 1) + q_halo(i, up)) * dy2
150  der_x = (q(i+1, 1) - 2.0*q(i, 1) + q(i-1, 1)) * dx2
151  dq(i, 1) = (der_x+der_y)
152  der_y = (q_halo(i, down) - 2.0*q(i, ny) + q(i, ny-1)) * dy2
153  der_x = (q(i+1, ny) - 2.0*q(i, ny) + q(i-1, ny)) * dx2
154  dq(i, ny) = (der_x+der_y)
155  end do
156  !$omp end parallel do
157  ! LHS-i = 1
158  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(j, der_x, der_y)
159  do j = 2, ny-1
160  der_y = (q(1, j+1) - 2.0*q(1, j) + q(1, j-1)) * dy2
161  der_x = (q(2, j) - 2.0*q(1, j) + q_halo(j, left)) * dx2
162  dq(1, j) = (der_x+der_y)
163  der_y = (q(nx, j+1) - 2.0*q(nx, j) + q(nx, j-1)) * dy2
164  der_x = (q_halo(j, right) - 2.0*q(nx, j) + q(nx-1, j)) * dx2
165  dq(nx, j) = (der_x+der_y)
166  end do
167  !$omp end parallel do
168  ! Bulk (non-boundary) nodes
169  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j, der_x, der_y)
170  do i = 2, nx-1
171  do j = 2, ny-1
172  der_y = (q(i, j+1) - 2*q(i, j) + q(i, j-1)) * dy2
173  der_x = (q(i+1, j) - 2*q(i, j) + q(i-1, j)) * dx2
174  dq(i, j) = (der_x+der_y)
175  end do
176  end do
177  !$omp end parallel do
178 
179  end subroutine del_q
180 
189 
190  subroutine dq_dx(dQx, Q, dx, Nx, Ny, Q_halo)
191  ! Subroutine to calculate dQ/dx
192  ! Using central differences
193  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
194  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: Q
195  real(real64), dimension(Nx, 4), intent(in):: Q_halo
196  real(real64), intent(in):: dx
197  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: dQx
198  real(real64):: dx_inv
199  integer:: i, j ! counters
200 
201  dx_inv = 1.0/(2.0*dx)
202 
203  ! LHS and RHS Boundary
204  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(j)
205  do j = 1, ny
206  dqx(1, j) = (q(2, j) - q_halo(j, left))*dx_inv ! Top
207  dqx(nx, j) = (q_halo(j, right) - q(nx-1, j))*dx_inv ! Bottom
208  do i = 2, nx-1
209  dqx(i, j) = (q(i+1, j) - q(i-1, j))*dx_inv
210  end do
211  end do
212  !$omp end parallel do
213 
214  end subroutine dq_dx
215 
224 
225  subroutine dq_dy(dQy, Q, dy, Nx, Ny, Q_halo)
226 
227  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
228  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: Q
229  real(real64), dimension(Nx, 4), intent(in):: Q_halo
230  real(real64), intent(in):: dy
231  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: dQy
232  real(real64):: dy_inv
233  integer:: i, j ! counters
234 
235  dy_inv = 1.0/(2.0*dy)
236 
237  ! Top and Bottom Boundary
238  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i)
239  do i = 1, nx
240  dqy(i, 1) = (q(i, 2) - q_halo(i, up))*dy_inv ! LHS
241  dqy(i, ny) = (q_halo(i, down) - q(i, ny-1))*dy_inv ! RHS
242  end do
243  !$omp end parallel do
244  ! Bulk (non-boundary nodes)
245  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j)
246  do j = 2, ny-1
247  do i = 1, nx
248  dqy(i, j) = (q(i, j+1) - q(i, j-1))*dy_inv
249  end do
250  end do
251  !$omp end parallel do
252 
253  end subroutine dq_dy
254 
255 
264 
265  subroutine dm_dy(dMy, M, dy, Nx, Ny, M_halo)
266 
267  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
268  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: M
269  real(real64), dimension(Nx, 4), intent(in):: M_halo
270  real(real64), intent(in):: dy
271  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: dMy
272  real(real64):: dy_inv
273  integer:: i, j ! counters
274 
275  dy_inv = 1.0/(2.0*dy)
276 
277  ! Top and Bottom Boundary
278  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i)
279  do i = 1, nx
280  dmy(i, 1) = (m(i, 2) - m_halo(i, up))*dy_inv ! Top
281  dmy(i, ny) = (m_halo(i, down) - m(i, nx-1))*dy_inv ! Bottom
282  end do
283  !$omp end parallel do
284  ! Bulk (non-boundary nodes)
285  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j)
286  do j = 2, ny-1
287  do i = 1, nx
288  dmy(i, j) = (m(i, j+1) - m(i, j-1))*dy_inv
289  end do
290  end do
291  !$omp end parallel do
292 
293  end subroutine dm_dy
294 
303 
304  subroutine dm_dx(dMx, M, dx, Nx, Ny, M_halo)
305  ! Subroutine to calculate dM/dx
306  ! Using central differences
307  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
308  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: M
309  real(real64), dimension(Nx, 4), intent(in):: M_halo
310  real(real64), intent(in):: dx
311  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: dMx
312  real(real64):: dx_inv
313  integer:: i, j ! counters
314 
315  dx_inv = 1.0/(2.0*dx)
316  ! LHS and RHS Boundary
317  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(j)
318  do j = 1, ny
319  dmx(1, j) = (m(2, j) - m_halo(j, left))*dx_inv ! LHS
320  dmx(nx, j) = (m_halo(j, right) - m(nx-1, j))*dx_inv ! RHS
321  do i = 2, nx-1
322  dmx(i, j) = (m(i+1, j) - m(i-1, j))*dx_inv
323  end do
324  end do
325  !$omp end parallel do
326  !print*, dMx
327 
328  end subroutine dm_dx
329 
339 
340  subroutine time_evolution(grid, grid_new, dQ, M, dt, Nx, Ny)
341 
342  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
343  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(in):: grid, dQ
344  real(real64), intent(in):: M, dt
345  real(real64), dimension(Nx, Ny), intent(out):: grid_new
346  integer:: i, j ! counters
347 
348  do i = 1, nx
349  do j = 1, ny
350  grid_new(i, j) = grid(i, j) + dt*m * dq(i, j)
351  end do
352  end do
353  end subroutine time_evolution
354 
355 
367 
368  subroutine time_evolution_new(c, c_new, M, Q, dx, dy, dt, Nx, Ny, Q_halo, M_halo)
369  integer, intent(in):: Nx, Ny
370  real(real64), intent(in):: c(Nx, Ny), Q(Nx, Ny), M(Nx, Ny)
371  real(real64), intent(in):: Q_halo(Nx, 4), M_halo(Nx, 4)
372  real(real64):: dQ(Nx, Ny), dQx(Nx, Ny), dQy(Nx, Ny)
373  real(real64):: dMx(Nx, Ny), dMy(Nx, Ny)
374  real(real64), intent(out):: c_new(Nx, Ny)
375  real(real64):: dx, dy, dt
376  real(real64):: alpha, beta, xbeta, ybeta
377  integer:: i, j ! counters
378 
379  call del_q(dq, q, dx, dy, nx, ny, q_halo)
380  call dq_dx(dqx, q, dx, nx, ny, q_halo)
381  call dm_dx(dmx, m, dx, nx, ny, m_halo)
382  call dm_dy(dmy, m, dy, nx, ny, m_halo)
383  call dq_dy(dqy, q, dy, nx, ny, q_halo)
384 
385  !$omp parallel do default(shared) private(i, j, alpha, xbeta, ybeta, beta)
386  do j = 1, ny
387  do i = 1, nx
388  alpha = m(i, j)*dq(i, j)
389  xbeta = dmx(i, j) * dqx(i, j)
390  ybeta = dmy(i, j) * dqy(i, j)
391  beta = xbeta+ybeta
392 
393  ! print*, alpha
394 
395  c_new(i, j) = c(i, j) + dt*(alpha+beta)
396  end do
397  end do
398  !$omp end parallel do
399  end subroutine time_evolution_new
400 
401 end module cahn_hilliard
